description: This is the main source file for a Flutter application implementing a Tic Tac Toe game with a Ocean Professional theme. It includes UI components for game board, score display, controls, and game logic handling player turns, win detection, and game reset functionalities.

classes.name: TicTacToeApp
classes.description: Main application widget setting up theme and launching the game screen.

classes.name: GameScreen
classes.description: Stateful widget managing game state, user interactions, and UI updates.

classes.name: ScoreBar
classes.description: Stateless widget displaying current player, scores, and game status.

classes.name: Board
classes.description: Stateless widget displaying the 3x3 game grid with touch interactions.

classes.name: Tile
classes.description: Stateful widget representing an individual cell in the game grid, with animations.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point, runs the Flutter app.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for each widget class, defining their UI layout.

methods.name: _handleTap
methods.description: Handles user taps on game cells, updates game state.

methods.name: _checkGameState
methods.description: Checks for a win or draw after each move.

methods.name: _resetBoardKeepScore
methods.description: Resets the game board while keeping scores.

methods.name: _newMatchResetScores
methods.description: Resets scores and starts a new match.

methods.name: _statusText
methods.description: Returns the current game status message.

methods.name: _tap
methods.description: On-tap handler for individual tiles with animation.
